author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

The EventSetup's DataProxy was poorly named (it is not a proxy). The name was changed to match the equivalent naming used in the Run/LuminosityBlock/Event system. All related names were also changed.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. This is strictly meant to be a refactoring of names so no functionality should be affected.
title: Rename DataProxy to ESProductResolver
